title: Recommended Visual Studio Code extensions (Developers Only) (/sdks/(clis)/ardrive-cli/(build-and-run-from-source)/recommended-visual-studio-code-extensions-developers-only)
content:
To ensure your environment is compatible, we also recommend the following VSCode extensions:

-   [ES-Lint][eslint-vscode]
-   [Editor-Config][editor-config-vscode]
-   [Prettier][prettier-vscode]
-   [ZipFS][zipfs-vscode]
